content.question: Which of the following observations best supports the claim that mitochondria evolved from once-free-living prokaryotic cells by the process of endocytosis?

choices.label: Mitochondria produce <math alttext="A T P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mtext>ATP</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>.
Mitochondria exchange substances with the cytosol.
Mitochondria are surrounded by a double membrane.

content.answer: Mitochondria are surrounded by a double membrane.

skill.text: 6.B: Support a claim with evidence from biological principles, concepts, processes, and data.
